Articles.Content:
This is one that started between friends, but is good for practising fuel management for noobs like me!

The aim of the challenge is to launch with 3 Kerbans, land one on Mun, one on Minmus and return the other to Kerbin (the third Kerban must at least reach Mun.) You can do this as a time challenge, or just for fun.

My completion of it, "Operation Argonauts"

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/mbj7izps5wscetw/rS4uL4durN

ok, i can do this pretty easily..

....

....

alright, done.

Since you don't specify an order, just that all 3 need doing, i did Minmus first because it has lower gravity than the Mun, the weight of the extra fuel at the first stop won't affect it as much.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Round trip complete in 5d 23h 15m 49s

I forgot to record the time of the Mun landing, but it was only an hour or two before the kerbin landing.

I burnt home FAST on that reentry!!!

Edited July 5, 2013 by kahlzun
.... I guess I win by default...
Interesting to do it all with one ship, and going to Minmus first is definitely better for fuel efficiency. Anyway well done!
I was hoping more people would try this.. :S
Does this have to be with stock parts?

Does this have to be with stock parts?

No, but we will all make fun of you secretly if you resort to modded parts.

Alright, done for some reason he didn't save the screenshots of the actual landings...
